description:
Description

title: Atelier La Fresque du Climat
description:

description:

title: ONLINE - Puzzle der Biodiversit√§t (DE) - Mit B√©n√©dicte Herbout
description:
Das Puzzle der Biodiversit√§t ist ein spielerischer und kooperativer Workshop, der darauf abzielt, das Bewusstsein f√ºr die Problematik des R√ºckgangs der biologischen Vielfalt zu sch√§rfen. W√§hrend dieses Workshops werden Sie die Funktionsweise von √ñkosystemen, die Rolle der Biodiversit√§t f√ºr das Wohlbefinden der Menschheit, die Interaktionen mit menschlichen Aktivit√§ten und die Bedrohung durch ihre Erosion entdecken.

Dieser Workshop wird online mit Hilfe eines Videokonferenz-Tools (z.B. ZOOM) und eines kollaborativen Tools (MURAL) durchgef√ºhrt. Die Teilnahme an diesem Workshop erfordert einen Computer mit einem funktionierenden Mikrofon.
Die Verbindungsinformationen werden vor dem Workshop per E-Mail verschickt.

Die Teilnahme an dem Workshop ist zu einem offenen Preis ab 10‚Ç¨ m√∂glich. Der gesammelte Betrag wird f√ºr die Finanzierung der Instrumente des Vereins "Fresque de la Biodiversit√©", f√ºr Sensibilisierungsma√ünahmen sowie f√ºr die Entwicklung des Netzwerks Fresque de la Biodiversit√© verwendet.

Dauer: 3h00
15 min Pr√§sentation des Workshops + Eisbrecher + Kennenlernen des Tools Mural
30 min Starter, um den Mechanismus der √ñkosysteme zu verstehen
75 min Puzzeln, mit 5 Stapeln und 40 Karten.
30 min Kreativit√§t, um das Puzzle zu pimpen und die Informationen aufzunehmen.

title: ONLINE Biodiversity Collage workshop (EN) - with Muruganandam MANDJINY
description:
Workshop held in English

The Biodiversity Collage is a playful and cooperative workshop that aims to raise awareness around the stakes of biodiversity collapsing. During this workshop, you will discover the functioning of ecosystems, the part that Biodiversity plays for the Humanity well being, the interactions with human activities and the threat regarding its erosion.
This workshop will be held online using a videoconference tool (zoom) and a collaborative tool (MURAL). The participation to this workshop requires then a computer with a functioning microphone.
The connection info will be sent by email before the workshop.
  The participation to the workshop is under open pricing, starting from 10‚Ç¨. The collected amount will be used to finance the tools of the association "Fresque de la Biodiversit√©", actions to raise awareness as well as the development of the Fresque de la Biodiversit√© network.
  Length : 3h00
15 min Presentation of the workshop + Icebreaker + getting familiar with the tool Mural
30 min Starter to understand the mecanism of the ecosystems
75 min Biodiversity Collage, with 5 decks and 40 cards.
30 min Creativity, to pimp your collage absorb the information
30 min Restitution, debriefing and discussion

title: ASIA PACIFIC DIGITAL COLLAGE TRAININGS IN ENGLISH - Facilitation Training Asia - Online
full_location: Online
description:
Please note that this facilitation training is intended for people :
- who have attended a Digital Collage workshop in the last 6 months
- who have already attended a Climate Fresk workshop (please contact us if you are unable to meet this requirement)

Your ticket is not modifiable and it is refundable only up to 7 days before the training. Would you please ensure you'll be really be able to attend this event, in order to maximize the group collective intelligence. Thanks in advance.

This training will allow you then to facilitate Digital Collage workshops in any non-commercial context under the Creative Commons BY-NC-ND license. In order to facilitate within a professional context, this will be soon available ; additional prerequisites will be required as well as the signature of a contract with the organisation. We will come back to this at the end of the training. 

This session will take place in person at the address indicated. Detailed information will be sent by email to registered participants a few days before the session. Out of respect for other participants, nobody will be accepted if more than 10 minutes late.
Once registered, your name, first name and email will be sent to the facilitator in charge of this session, in order to send you a briefing email before the session and another email after. This data will not then be kept by the association.

title: ONLINE DIGITAL COLLAGE WORKSHOPS IN ITALIAN - Workshop online con Marco Buscemi
description:
Il Digital Collage √® un workshop ludico e collaborativo.

L'obiettivo del workshop √® di sensibilizzare e formare i partecipanti sui problemi ambientali e sociali delle tecnologie digitali. Il workshop si propone anche di delineare soluzioni per una maggiore sostenibilit√† nelle tecnologie digitali e quindi ad aprire discussioni tra i partecipanti sull'argomento.
Il tuo biglietto non √® modificabile ed √® rimborsabile solo fino a 7 giorni prima del workshop. Ti preghiamo di assicurarti di poter davvero partecipare a questo evento, al fine di massimizzare l'intelligenza collettiva del gruppo. Grazie in anticipo.

Il prezzo della tua partecipazione √® libero e finanzier√† l'associazione "La Fresque du Num√©rique" (Il Digital Collage).

title: Fresque de l'Alimentation EN LIGNE avec J√©r√©mi
description:
Description de l‚Äôatelier
L‚Äôatelier de La Fresque de l‚ÄôAlimentation est un atelier ludique et p√©dagogique qui a pour objectif d‚Äôaccompagner les participant.e.s vers une alimentation plus durable et une prise de conscience des impacts de leur alimentation (environnement, biodiversit√©, sant√© et r√©silience territoriale).
L'atelier s'adapte et propose une version en ligne !

L‚Äôatelier est bas√© sur l‚Äôintelligence collective, l‚Äôanimateur.rice est l√† pour s‚Äôassurer du bon d√©roul√©, r√©pondre aux questions, ‚Ä¶ mais ce sont les participant.e.s qui pratiquent !
La partie R√©flexion se base sur 40 cartes r√©parties en 5 lots, √† placer en liant les causes et les cons√©quences entre elles via des fl√®ches
L‚Äôatelier pousse √† la prise d‚Äôactions (manger local, de saison, alimentation plus v√©g√©tale, ...)
L'atelier se base sur des sources scientifiques et reconnues (FAO, GIEC, ADEME, ...)
L'atelier s'adresse aux adultes de plus de 18 ans (une version junior est en cours de r√©flexion), experts ou novices sur le sujet, d√©j√† engag√©s ou non vers une alimentation plus durable, ... Bref, l'atelier s'adresse √† quiconque souhaite comprendre ce qu'il.elle mange ! Aucun pr√©requis n'est demand√© pour faire l'atelier !
D√©roul√©
L‚Äôatelier dure environ 3h et se d√©coupe en plusieurs √©tapes :
D√©marrage (30 min) : icebreaker, pr√©sentation des participant.e.s, de l‚Äôanimateur.rice, de l‚Äôatelier, ‚Ä¶
R√©flexion (1h15) : √©tude des causes et cons√©quences de nos consommations sur le climat, la biodiversit√©, la sant√© et la r√©silience alimentaire
Solutions (30 min) : quelles solutions pouvons-nous mettre en place d√®s maintenant √† notre √©chelle pour tendre vers une alimentation plus durable ? Quelles sont leurs cons√©quences ?
Actions (30 min) : choix d‚Äôune action individuelle et une action collective pour tendre vers une alimentation plus durable et anticipation des difficult√©s/freins qui pourraient √™tre rencontr√©s
D√©brief (15 min) : retours sur l‚Äôatelier, derniers conseils, quelle suite donner √† l‚Äôatelier, ...
Croyez-nous, √ßa passe (tr√®s) vite !
